attributes.action: allow the public to claim refunds from the government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government and all its departments provide a service for which they are paid. However the service provided is at best abismal at times. In any other service industry you can go somewhere else. With the government that's not possible so lets start claiming back our taxes for poor/shoddy services provided or not provided.
